verses.verse: And it came<WG1096> to pass, that, as he was praying<WG4336> in a certain<WG5100> place,<WG5117> when<WG5613> he ceased,<WG3973> one<WG5100> of his disciples<WG3101> said<WG2036> to him, Lord,<WG2962> teach<WG1321> us to pray,<WG4336> as John<WG2491> also<WG2532> taught<WG1321> his disciples.<WG3101>

And he said<WG2036> to them, When<WG3752> you pray,<WG4336> say,<WG3004> Our Father<WG3962> which<WG3588> are in heaven,<WG3772> Hallowed<WG37> be your name.<WG3686> Your kingdom<WG932> come.<WG2064> Your will<WG2307> be done,<WG1096> as in heaven,<WG3772> so<WG2532> in earth. <WG1093>
Give<WG1325> us day<WG3588> by day<WG3588> our daily<WG1967> bread. <WG740>

And forgive<WG863> us our sins;<WG266> for we also<WG2532> forgive<WG863> every<WG3956> one that is indebted<WG3784> to us. And lead<WG1533> us not into<WG1519> temptation;<WG3986> but deliver<WG4506> us from evil. <WG4190>

And he said<WG2036> to them, Which<WG5101> of you shall have<WG2192> a friend,<WG5384> and shall go<WG4198> to him at<WG3317> midnight,<WG3317> and say<WG2036> to him, Friend,<WG5384> lend<WG5531> me three<WG5140> loaves; <WG740>
For a friend<WG5384> of my<WG3450> in his journey<WG3598> is come<WG3854> to me, and I have<WG2192> nothing <WG3756> <WG3739> to set<WG3908> before<WG3908> him?

And he from within<WG2081> shall answer<WG611> and say,<WG2036> Trouble<WG2873> me not: the door<WG2374> is now<WG2235> shut,<WG2808> and my children<WG3813> are with me in bed;<WG2845> I cannot <WG3756> <WG1410> rise<WG450> and give<WG1325> you.

I say<WG3004> to you, Though<WG1499> he will not rise<WG1453> and give<WG1325> him, because<WG1223> he is his friend,<WG5384> yet<WG1065> because<WG1223> of his importunity<WG335> he will rise<WG450> and give<WG1325> him as many<WG3745> as he needs. <WG5535>
And I say<WG3004> to you, Ask,<WG154> and it shall be given<WG1325> you; seek,<WG2212> and you shall find;<WG2147> knock,<WG2925> and it shall be opened<WG455> to you.
For every<WG3956> one that asks<WG154> receives;<WG2983> and he that seeks<WG2212> finds;<WG2147> and to him that knocks<WG2925> it shall be opened. <WG455>

If a son<WG5207> shall ask<WG154> bread<WG740> of any<WG5100> of you that is a father,<WG3962> will he give<WG1929> him a stone?<WG3037> or if he ask a fish,<WG2486> will he for a fish<WG2486> give<WG1929> him a serpent? <WG3789>
Or <WG2228> <WG2532> if<WG1437> he shall ask<WG154> an egg,<WG5609> will he offer<WG1929> him a scorpion? <WG4651>

If<WG1487> you then,<WG3767> being<WG5225> evil,<WG4190> know<WG1492> how to give<WG1325> good<WG18> gifts<WG1390> to your<WG5216> children:<WG5043> how<WG4214> much<WG4214> more<WG3123> shall your<WG3588> heavenly <WG1537> <WG3772> Father<WG3962> give<WG1325> the Holy<WG40> Spirit<WG4151> to them that ask<WG154> him?

And he was casting<WG1544> out a devil,<WG1140> and it was dumb.<WG2974> And it came<WG1096> to pass, when the devil<WG1140> was gone<WG1831> out, the dumb<WG2974> spoke;<WG2980> and the people<WG3793> wondered.<WG2296>
But some<WG5100> of them said,<WG2036> He casts<WG1544> out devils<WG1140> through<WG1722> Beelzebub<WG954> the chief<WG758> of the devils.<WG1140>
And others,<WG2087> tempting<WG3985> him, sought<WG2212> of him a sign<WG4592> from heaven.<WG3772>

But he, knowing<WG1492> their thoughts,<WG1270> said<WG2036> to them, Every<WG3956> kingdom<WG932> divided<WG1266> against<WG1909> itself<WG1438> is brought<WG2049> to desolation;<WG2049> and a house <WG3624> divided against<WG1909> a house<WG3624> falls. <WG4098>

If<WG1499> Satan<WG4567> also<WG2532> be divided<WG1266> against<WG1909> himself,<WG1438> how<WG4459> shall his kingdom<WG932> stand?<WG2476> because<WG3754> you say<WG3004> that I cast<WG1544> out devils<WG1140> through<WG1722> Beelzebub. <WG954>

And if<WG1487> I by Beelzebub<WG954> cast<WG1544> out devils,<WG1140> by whom<WG5101> do<WG4160> your<WG5216> sons<WG5207> cast <WG1544> them out? therefore <WG1223> <WG5124> shall they be your<WG5216> judges. <WG2923>
But if<WG1487> I with the finger<WG1147> of God<WG2316> cast<WG1544> out devils,<WG1140> no<WG686> doubt<WG686> the kingdom<WG932> of God<WG2316> is come<WG5348> on you.
When<WG3752> a strong<WG2478> man armed<WG2528> keeps<WG5442> his palace,<WG833> his goods<WG5224> are in peace: <WG1515>

But when<WG1875> a stronger<WG2478> than he shall come<WG1904> on him, and overcome<WG3528> him, he takes<WG142> from him all<WG3833> his armor<WG3833> wherein <WG1909> <WG3739> he trusted,<WG3982> and divides<WG1239> his spoils. <WG4661>
He that is not with me is against<WG2596> me: and he that gathers<WG4863> not with me scatters. <WG4650>

When<WG3752> the unclean<WG169> spirit<WG4151> is gone<WG1831> out of a man,<WG444> he walks<WG1330> through<WG1223> dry<WG504> places,<WG5117> seeking<WG2212> rest;<WG372> and finding<WG2147> none,<WG3361> he said,<WG3004> I will return<WG5290> to my house<WG3624> from where<WG3606> I came<WG1831> out.
And when he comes,<WG2064> he finds <WG2147> it swept<WG4563> and garnished. <WG2885>

Then<WG5119> goes<WG4198> he, and takes <WG3880> to him seven<WG2033> other<WG2087> spirits<WG4151> more wicked<WG4191> than himself;<WG1438> and they enter<WG1525> in, and dwell<WG2730> there:<WG1563> and the last <WG2078> state of that man<WG444> is worse<WG5501> than the first. <WG4413>

And it came<WG1096> to pass, as he spoke<WG3004> these<WG5023> things, a certain<WG5100> woman<WG1135> of the company<WG3793> lifted<WG1869> up her voice,<WG5456> and said<WG2036> to him, Blessed<WG3107> is the womb<WG2836> that bore<WG941> you, and the breasts<WG3149> which<WG3739> you have sucked.<WG2337>
But he said,<WG2036> Yes<WG3304> rather,<WG3304> blessed <WG3107> are they that hear<WG191> the word<WG3056> of God,<WG2316> and keep<WG5442> it.

And when the people<WG3793> were gathered<WG1865> thick together,<WG1865> he began<WG756> to say,<WG3004> This<WG3778> is an evil<WG4190> generation:<WG1074> they seek<WG1934> a sign;<WG4592> and there shall no<WG3756> sign<WG4592> be given<WG1325> it, but the sign<WG4592> of Jonas<WG2495> the prophet. <WG4396>
For as Jonas<WG2495> was a sign<WG4592> to the Ninevites,<WG3536> so<WG3779> shall also<WG2532> the Son<WG5207> of man<WG444> be to this<WG5026> generation. <WG1074>

The queen<WG938> of the south<WG3558> shall rise<WG1453> up in the judgment<WG2920> with the men<WG435> of this<WG5026> generation,<WG1074> and condemn<WG2632> them: for she came<WG2064> from the utmost<WG4009> parts of the earth<WG1093> to hear<WG191> the wisdom<WG4678> of Solomon;<WG4672> and, behold,<WG2400> a greater<WG4119> than Solomon <WG4672> is here. <WG5602>

The men<WG435> of Nineve<WG3535> shall rise<WG450> up in the judgment<WG2920> with this<WG5026> generation,<WG1074> and shall condemn<WG2632> it: for they repented<WG3340> at<WG1519> the preaching<WG2782> of Jonas;<WG2495> and, behold,<WG2400> a greater<WG4119> than Jonas <WG2495> is here. <WG5602>

No<WG3762> man,<WG3762> when he has lighted<WG681> a candle,<WG3088> puts <WG5087> it in a secret<WG2926> place, neither<WG3761> under<WG5259> a bushel,<WG3426> but on<WG1909> a candlestick,<WG3087> that they which<WG3588> come<WG1531> in may see<WG991> the light. <WG5338>

The light<WG3088> of the body<WG4983> is the eye:<WG3788> therefore<WG3767> when<WG1875> your<WG4675> eye<WG3788> is single,<WG573> your whole<WG3650> body<WG4983> also<WG2532> is full<WG5460> of light;<WG5460> but when <WG3752> your eye<WG3788> is evil,<WG4190> your body<WG4983> also <WG2532> is full of darkness. <WG4652>
Take<WG4648> heed<WG4648> therefore<WG3767> that the light<WG5457> which<WG3588> is in you be not darkness. <WG4655>

If<WG1487> your whole<WG3650> body<WG4983> therefore <WG3767> be full<WG5460> of light,<WG5460> having<WG2192> no <WG3365> <WG5100> part<WG3313> dark,<WG4652> the whole<WG3650> shall be full<WG5460> of light,<WG5460> as when<WG3752> the bright<WG796> shining<WG796> of a candle<WG3088> does give<WG5461> you light. <WG5461>
And as he spoke,<WG2980> a certain<WG5100> Pharisee<WG5330> sought<WG2065> him to dine<WG709> with him: and he went<WG1525> in, and sat<WG377> down<WG377> to meat.
And when the Pharisee<WG5330> saw<WG1492> it, he marveled<WG2296> that he had not first<WG4412> washed<WG907> before<WG4253> dinner.<WG712>

And the Lord<WG2962> said<WG2036> to him, Now<WG3568> do you Pharisees<WG5330> make<WG2511> clean<WG2511> the outside<WG1855> of the cup<WG4221> and the platter;<WG4094> but your<WG5216> inward<WG2081> part is full<WG1073> of ravening<WG724> and wickedness. <WG4189>
You fools,<WG878> did not he that made<WG4160> that which<WG3588> is without<WG1855> make<WG4160> that which is within<WG2081> also? <WG2532>
But rather<WG4133> give<WG1325> alms<WG1654> of such things as you have;<WG1751> and, behold,<WG2400> all<WG3956> things are clean<WG2513> to you.

But woe<WG3759> to you, Pharisees!<WG5330> for you tithe<WG586> mint<WG2238> and rue<WG4076> and all<WG3956> manner of herbs,<WG3001> and pass<WG3928> over<WG3928> judgment<WG2920> and the love<WG26> of God:<WG2316> these<WG5023> ought<WG1163> you to have done,<WG4160> and not to leave<WG863> the other<WG2548> undone.
Woe<WG3759> to you, Pharisees!<WG5330> for you love<WG25> the uppermost<WG4410> seats<WG4410> in the synagogues,<WG4864> and greetings<WG783> in the markets. <WG58>

Woe<WG3759> to you, scribes<WG1122> and Pharisees,<WG5330> hypocrites!<WG5273> for you are as graves<WG3419> which<WG3588> appear<WG82> not, and the men<WG444> that walk<WG4043> over <WG1883> them are not aware <WG1492> of them.
Then<WG1161> answered<WG611> one<WG5100> of the lawyers,<WG3544> and said<WG3004> to him, Master,<WG1320> thus<WG5023> saying<WG3004> you reproach<WG5195> us also.<WG2532>

And he said,<WG2036> Woe<WG3759> to you also, <WG2532> you lawyers!<WG3544> for you lade<WG5412> men<WG444> with burdens<WG5413> grievous<WG1418> to be borne,<WG1418> and you yourselves<WG846> touch<WG4379> not the burdens<WG5413> with one<WG1520> of your<WG5216> fingers. <WG1147>
Woe<WG3759> to you! for you build<WG3618> the sepulchers<WG3419> of the prophets,<WG4396> and your<WG5216> fathers<WG3962> killed<WG615> them.

Truly<WG686> you bear<WG3140> witness<WG3140> that you allow<WG4909> the deeds<WG2041> of your<WG5216> fathers:<WG3962> for they indeed<WG3303> killed<WG615> them, and you build<WG3618> their sepulchers. <WG3419>
Therefore also<WG2532> said<WG2036> the wisdom<WG4678> of God,<WG2316> I will send<WG649> them prophets<WG4396> and apostles,<WG652> and some of them they shall slay<WG615> and persecute: <WG1559>

That the blood<WG129> of all<WG3956> the prophets,<WG4396> which<WG3588> was shed<WG1632> from the foundation<WG2602> of the world,<WG2889> may be required<WG1567> of this<WG5026> generation; <WG1074>

From the blood<WG129> of Abel<WG6> to the blood<WG129> of Zacharias <WG2197> which<WG3588> perished<WG622> between<WG3342> the altar<WG2379> and the temple:<WG3624> truly<WG3483> I say<WG3004> to you, It shall be required<WG1567> of this<WG5026> generation. <WG1074>

Woe<WG3759> to you, lawyers!<WG3544> for you have taken<WG142> away the key<WG2807> of knowledge:<WG1108> you entered<WG1525> not in yourselves,<WG846> and them that were entering<WG1525> in you hindered. <WG2967>

And as he said<WG3004> these<WG5023> things to them, the scribes<WG1122> and the Pharisees<WG5330> began<WG756> to urge<WG1758> him vehemently,<WG1171> and to provoke<WG653> him to speak<WG653> of many<WG4119> things:
Laying<WG1748> wait<WG1748> for him, and seeking<WG2212> to catch<WG2340> something<WG5100> out of his mouth,<WG4750> that they might accuse<WG2723> him.
